description: South-North facing,  4-bedroom (2 bedroom are south facing), 4-bathroom, 1870 SF of modem living space with a double side by side car garage, private patio on ground level & balcony on main. The layout includes 3 good size bedrooms and 2 bathrooms upstairs; spacious living, dining, kitchen and 1 bathroom on the main floor; and 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom on ground floor with access to fenced patio. Features include Kitchen Aid appliance package, caesarstone quartz countertops, updated ceiling lighting.
